answers.answer: Hi,Appears like a blood circulatory problem. Does he have high BP or Diabetes? He should consult a physician for a detailed health check up.Solace

I agree.  This is probably related to diabetes or hardening of the arteries or a pinched nerve.  He needs to be checked out.  It is his first warning of a health issue.  If the problem is addressed, hopefully his erections will come back.  Or maybe not completely, but he could get a prescription for Viagra.

question: my boyfriend can not stay erect and we have tried oral and porn his legs tingle really bad and go numb afterward... What can we do? Our sex life *****
title: can't stay hard
